title: The Wayward Muse
description: Raised in the slums of Oxford with a certainty of her own homeliness, seventeen-year-old stableman's daughter Jane Burden is discovered by the charismatic and irreverent painter Dante Gabriel Rossetti, with whom she falls madly in love before circumstances prompt her marriage to the shy craftsman William Morris. By the author of The Painted Kiss. 50,000 first printing.
author: Elizabeth  Hickey
